title: j9n8.github.io
content:
J9N8 is a two-member team of indie game developers; me and . The J9N8's primary vision is to explore, grow, create, learn, and develop fun games everyone can enjoy and apps everyone can use.

We will be releasing more Android products soon! We have 1 in-progress and 4 pending projects. Check out our website at (available on both game-mode and standard-mode version).
